import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Breadcrumb from "../../common/breadcrumb"; import CKEditors from "react-ckeditor-component"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { obtenerProveedoresAccion } from "../../../store/Interlocutores/Proveedores"; import { obtenerCondicionProductoAccion } from "../../../store/CondicionProducto/CondicionProducto"; import { Card, CardBody, CardHeader, Col, Container, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, Button, } from "reactstrap"; import one from "../../../assets/images/pro3/1.jpg"; import user from "../../../assets/images/user.png"; const Add_product = ({ afterPaste, onBlur, onChange }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [generico, setGenerico] = useState(null); const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const [file, setFile] = useState(); const [dummyimgs, setDummyimgs] = useState([ { img: user }, { img: user }, { img: user }, { img: user }, { img: user }, { img: user }, ]); const handleChangeGenerico = (selectedOptions) => { //console.log("OPCION SELECCIONADA : ", selectedOptions); //alert("GENERICO"); setGenerico(selectedOptions); }; //Lee del State los proveedores const proveedores = useSelector( (state) => state.proveedores.proveedores ); console.log("PROVEEDORES : ", useSelector(state => state.proveedores.proveedores)); //Lee del State las condociones que se pueden asignar a los productos const condicionProducto = useSelector( (state) => state.condicionproducto.condicionproducto ); console.log("CONDICIONES PRODUCTO : ", condicionProducto); const IncrementItem = () => { if (quantity < 9) { setQuantity(quantity + 1); } else { return null; } }; const DecreaseItem = () => { if (quantity > 0) { setQuantity(quantity - 1); } else { return null; } }; const handleChange = (event) => { setQuantity(event.target.value); }; // image upload const _handleImgChange = (e, i) => { e.preventDefault(); let reader = new FileReader(); const image = e.target.files[0]; reader.onload = () => { dummyimgs[i].img = reader.result; setFile({ file: file }); setDummyimgs(dummyimgs); }; reader.readAsDataURL(image); }; const handleValidSubmit = () => { }; return (

); }; export default Add_product;
